item.title: Change the request limit from 250 to 100
item.description: https://microlink.io/ - It turns any website into data such as metatags normalization, beauty link previews, scraping capabilities or screenshots as a service. 100 reqs/day every day free.

item.title: Update README.md
item.description: https://element.io/ - A decentralized and open source communication tool built on Matrix. Group chats, direct messaging, encrypted file transfers, voice and video chats, and easy integration with other services.

item.title: Update DeepSource description
item.description: https://deepsource.io/ - DeepSource continuously analyzes source code changes, finds and fixes issues categorized under security, performance, anti-patterns, bug-risks, documentation and style. Native integration with GitHub, GitLab and Bitbucket.

item.title: Merged two items

item.description: https://www.woopra.com/ - Free user analytics platform for 500K actions, 90 day data retention, 30+ one click integration.

item.title: Adding New Tools
item.description:
https://www.bigdatacloud.com/ip-geolocation-apis) - Fast, accurate, and free (up to 10K/month - Geolocation API](https://www.bigdatacloud.com/ip-geolocation-apis) - Fast, accurate, and free (up to 10K/month) IP geolocation API. The API provides country data, detailed locality, estimated location coordinates, network data, BGP prefixes and confidence area.
https://www.bigdatacloud.com/geocoding-apis/free-reverse-geocode-to-city-api - Reverse Gecoding API](https://www.bigdatacloud.com/geocoding-apis/free-reverse-geocode-to-city-api) - Free client-side reverse geocoding API that converts geo-coordinates into physical address. Unlimited query for client side implementation. No API key required.
https://www.woopra.com/ - Free user analytics platform for 500K actions, 90 day data retention, 30+ one click integration.

item.title: Add reSmush.it
item.description: https://resmush.it - reSmush.it is a FREE API that provides image optimization. reSmush.it has been implemented on the most common CMS such as Wordpress, Drupal or Magento. reSmush.it is the most used image optimization API with more than 7 billions images already treated, and is still Free of charge.

item.title: add scraperbox.com
item.description: https://scraperbox.com/ - Undetectable web scraping API using real Chrome browsers and proxy rotation. Use a simple API call to scrape any web page. Free plan has 1000 requests per month.

item.title: Added Wufoo for forms
item.description: https://www.wufoo.com/ - Quick forms to use on websites. Free plan has a limit of 100 submissions each month.

item.title: Add Invantive Cloud
item.description: https://cloud.invantive.com/) — Access over 70 (cloud)platforms such as Exact Online, Twinfield, ActiveCampaign or Visma using Invantive SQL or OData4 (typically Power BI or Power Query - — Access over 70 (cloud)platforms such as Exact Online, Twinfield, ActiveCampaign or Visma using Invantive SQL or OData4 (typically Power BI or Power Query). Includes data replication and exchange. Free plan for developers and implementation consultants. Free for specific platforms with limitations in data volumes.
